description: The Inn of Chicago, originally known as the Hotel St. Clair, was built in 1927 by Oman & Lihienthal, and is located on the corner of Ohio Street and St. Clair. The hotel is now part of the Choice Hotels International hotel chain, after a history involving many exchanges between management companies.
